templates.name: What kind of foundation can I put your mattress on?
templates.content: We recommend using one of our Comfort Bases. They're the perfect fit for you and your mattress. Our Comfort Bases provide a flat, uniformly solid surface to prevent sagging in the middle. Don't place your Cariloha Mattress directly onto widely placed slats, as this will cause the bamboo memory foam to sag prematurely and will void the 10-year warranty. A box spring with slats that are placed no more than 3" apart, or 1/4" thick plywood on top of a box spring will also work.

templates.name: What are Locking Tuners?
templates.content: The difference between the locking tuners and non-locking tuners is that locking tuners have a clamping mechanism to lock the string in place. Locking tuners are most beneficial for guitars with a tremolo, as the strings are locked to the tuner. This reduces the amount of string slippage and will better keep the guitar in tune when using a tremolo.

templates.name: What is the best way to clean the glasses?
templates.content:

When you order the glasses from us, we recommend adding some of our Lens Cleaner to your cart! This is great to use when the smudges are being stubborn, or you need a better clean.

Please be careful to avoid using hot water on your lenses, as they can develop bubbles or cracks when exposed to high heat. Do not use tissues, paper towels, your shirt, or any harsh chemicals as they may scratch your lenses or damage the coating on the frames.

templates.name: What grade steel do you use?
templates.content: We use 18/8 304 stainless steel on everything except the grate, which is made of 430 stainless. Because of the high heat of the grate all grades of stainless perform pretty similar. The 304 and 18/8 are the same thing. 430 is also known as 18/0. 18/10 is also a 300 series stainless but has a little higher nickel percentage and more commonly used for cookware and flatware. 18/8 is the grade of US standardized 304.

templates.name: How do your magic channels work?
templates.content:
The seams in the core of our upgraded diapers are a proprietary technology that allows moisture to be evenly distributed throughout the diaper, for a better fit for the baby. 

It actually allows for a form/flexible fit of the diaper that cups baby, is less bulky (there is no sagging when the liquid is evenly distributed) and is more comfortable for baby. The magic channels also allow for better performance and keeping baby's skin drier and healthier.  

Our new diapers are also enhanced with organic cotton (the only diaper in the US that has organic cotton!) Organic cotton is super soft and safer for baby's skin. With 16% of the world's pesticides going to grow cotton, organic cotton is pure.

There are a few exceptions, however, we do have some accessories and/or fabric that we have made and/or sourced from China/Korea/etc, but we do a lot of research beforehand and choose factories that pay their workers a living wage, have amazing work conditions, and we keep a good relationship with our contacts!

templates.name: Are the your products hypoallergenic?

Our products' easy washability helps to ensure all dust and allergens are kept at bay.

templates.name: Do I have to be concerned with allergies when taking any of the Hair Wellness Boosters?
templates.content:
As with our hair growth formulas, we recommend you carefully read the labels and be mindful of any discomfort that may occur while taking our targeted boosters. For those people who have a known allergy to the Asteraceae family of plants, please use caution when taking the Toxin Cleanse booster. This includes allergies to ragweed, chamomile, dandelion, mugwort, milk thistle, artichoke, and yellow dock.

Please consult with your doctor before making any changes to your supplement routine.

templates.name: Where should I put my Litter-Robot?
templates.content: Starting out, we recommend placing your Litter-Robot near your cat's old litter box. As soon as your cat starts using their self-cleaning litter box regularly, remove the old litter box. At this point, the placement is up to you. If possible, we recommend placing Litter-Robot on a firm surface. If your Litter-Robot sits on carpet or has a rug/mat under it, the cat sensor can become less sensitive over time, potentially leading to issues with sensing when your kitty has entered/exited the unit.

templates.name: Do you sell waterproof car covers?
templates.content:
We don't sell waterproof covers, and that's by design. Since 1965, we've been trusted by car owners to protect their vehicles with covers that are carefully engineered for long-term care. One of the biggest lessons we've learned in six decades of craftsmanship is that waterproof materials can do more harm than good. A true waterproof fabric doesn't breathe. That means any moisture, humidity, or gases trapped underneath have nowhere to escape. The result? Rust, corrosion, and even mold-the very problems you're trying to avoid. That's why especially our outdoor car covers are made with water-resistant, breathable fabrics designed to: 

• Shed most rainfall and block moisture from seeping in 
• Allow trapped heat and humidity to escape, protecting finishes and metalwork 
• Prevent rust and corrosion, keeping your vehicle safe for the long run 

By balancing water resistance with breathability, we ensure your cover protects without trapping damage underneath. So, while you won't find a "waterproof" car cover here, you'll get something better: a cover built with over 60 years of expertise-engineered to safeguard your vehicle the right way. View each material water repellency rating for which is best for your needs.

templates.name: How is an axle measured?
templates.content: That would depend on the axle type. Semi-float and C-clip-equipped axle shafts are measured from the end of the shaft to the outer edge of the mounting flange. Axles with yokes (front axle shafts) are measured from the center of the u-joint bore to the end of the splines. Full-float designs are measured from the spline ends to the front surface of the mounting flange.

templates.name: Why are vitamins and antioxidants important?
templates.content:
Our bodies need a consistent amount of vitamins and minerals to promote homeostasis and optimal health. Vitamin deficiencies can contribute to a variety of acute and long-term conditions.

Antioxidants are an essential part of maintaining a healthy immune system, detoxifying your body and removing free radicals that can contribute to cellular damage. Antioxidants also play a role in energy production.

templates.name: Does Reveree change the color of your discharge?
templates.content:
We have not studied this specifically in clinical studies, we've been told anecdotally by women using this product that if any discharge is experienced, it is often transparent and natural-looking in terms of consistency. Additionally, in clinical studies, women saw relief with Revaree as early as day 9 of treatment, with symptom relief improving over time. As a quick reminder, the recommended dose of Revaree is 1 vaginal insert, every 2-3 days at bedtime or use as directed by your healthcare provider.

If you have a specific question, we recommend reaching out to your healthcare provider as they know your medical history best.

Our product development team then sources materials throughout Europe and Asia, with final hand assembly performed at family-owned factories in Asia. Once they arrive back in Louisiana, our team carefully finishes detailing and inspects each frame before sending them out to the customer.

templates.name: Can I take multiple doses?
templates.content: There is no FDA daily recommended dose of probiotics, because a higher CFU count doesn't always mean better results. Our science supports that a precise combination can help seed your gut and keep it healthy at around 1 billion CFU per day, however, we also know that every individual's gut is different. Therefore, some people may enjoy an additional benefit by adding more probiotics and possibly prebiotics. We also suggest that you speak with your physician or nutritionist to determine what dosage may be best for your gut, and your health.

templates.name: My succulent is going soft, translucent yellow and mushy
templates.content: As succulents grow or adjust to new conditions, they shed their older, lower leaves. Often these leaves are dry and crispy, but in some conditions, a plant will have a "wet shed" of mushy lower leaves. If, however, you notice top or center leaves becoming mushy, translucent, and yellow, the leaves are likely rotting from too much water. In this case, immediately reduce tje watering frequency and allow the soil to fully dry out. Move it into a location with slightly more sunlight and good ventilation and remove tje leaves that are already mushy and translucent.

templates.name: What does Progressive Lens mean?
templates.content:
Progressive lenses aid in an eye condition called Presbyopia. This is a very common vision condition that usually starts around the age of 40 and results in the loss of the ability to focus on near things. If you have an add power listed on your prescription you are presbyopic. As this condition progresses with age people usually transition from wearing single-vision lenses to multi-focal or progressive lenses.

You can read more about it here: https://diff.attn.tv/sl/DH7zwk4W

templates.name: Is green juice gluten free?
templates.content: All of our products are certified Gluten-Free by the Gluten Intolerance Group (GIG).  Our Green Juice does contain wheatgrass, and it's a common misunderstanding that wheatgrass is wheat/gluten-containing; it is not. Wheatgrass is grass! Just the grass contains absolutely no seeds. The seeds in mature wheat are what contain the protein gluten that causes reactions in celiac as well as non-celiac gluten sensitivity. If you have an allergy specifically to wheat that is not gluten related or other grasses and are concerned; as with any other nutritional supplement - please do check with your healthcare provider.

templates.name: How do I qualify for and redeem my birthday gift?
templates.content:
Members receive one birthday benefit every year once they complete their profile in their StyleRewards Account or provide it to the Associate at POS upon enrollment. Members must provide their birthday at least three days before their birthdate.

Birthday rewards are sent on the first day of your birthday month, and you have the whole month of your birthday to use it. Note that if a member enrolls during her birthday month, she will receive her birthday reward on the first day of the following month. To redeem a birthday reward, use the barcode in your email to redeem in-store (or an Associate can look it up). Or log in to your online StyleRewards account and enter the code in the Promotional Code box at online checkout.

templates.name: How often should I use a hair mask?
templates.content: Depending on the condition of your hair, you may want to increase the use of your hair mask to 2 times a week until you achieve the desired results you are looking for. From there, you can apply this as a maintenance treatment once a week.

templates.name: Difference between the Carver/Forte/Baron Head Replacement Blades
templates.content: Carver features dual cutting rings and flat foil mesh and is recommended for coarse hair. Forte features dual cutting rings and beveled foil mesh. Cutting performance between them is similar, although Forte will feel smoother as it glides across your skin due to the curved and beveled foils. Forte is our most popular and is the best choice for most people. Baron features 3 cutting rings per shaving head: two with S shaped openings, and one cutting ring with dots. Those with sensitive skin and fine hair will love this style.

templates.name: I live near a lake. Which Kayak should I get?
templates.content:
Oru Lake is best for light and fast fun on calm waters. Oru Inlet is best for beginners and calm water adventures. Oru Beach LT is best for light and easy kayaking on calm waters.

Oru Beach LT Sport is best for calm waters with added features for versatility. Oru Bay ST is great for various conditions, including casual cruising and fishing. Oru Coast XT is great for serious adventurers and challenging conditions. Oru Haven TT is best for tandem or single-seater flatwater kayaking.

templates.name: How do I hone a knife?
templates.content: Hold your sharpening steel vertically on a non-slip base. Hold the knife at a 20-degree angle to the steel's shaft, then draw the knife in one smooth motion from the heel of the blade to the tip. Repeat five to six times on each side. Be sure to use the same number of strokes for each side. You can also check out our YouTube video for more information here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dY2W8wLLl5s&ab_channel=LamsonProducts

templates.name: Do you offer financing?
templates.content:
We are partnered with Affirm, Klarna, and Shop Pay. Affirm offers equal monthly payments split into 3, 6, or 12 months. Klarna and Shop Pay, allow you to split your payment into 4 interest-free installments paid bi-weekly over 4 weeks. When you reach the checkout page, choose among the three as your payment provider and it will prompt you to prequalify, you will know right away how much you need to put down or the amount you need to pay per month. Once you're qualified, we will mail you the free mold kits so you can do your molds at home and mail your teeth impressions back for production. The finished piece will be sent to you once we're done so you can wear it while making payments. 

Lastly, If you're having issues with approval, we do have the layaway option available. You can check out how it works here: https://www.customgoldgrillz.com/pages/layaway-policy The gist of it is you can lock in the price of your piece and you just have to put in a 10% initial deposit. Best thing about this is no approval or assessments required and it is interest free. You have the flexibility on how much and when you can for the remaining amount (up to 365 days depending on the amount of your order). We'll start the process and send you the molding kits once you're able to pay off 75% of the total order.

templates.name: Will my jewelry tarnish?
templates.content: Some finishes will tarnish more easily than others, with the most susceptible being antiqued silver. Protectants are applied to all our finishes to help prevent or slow this process, but tarnishing may still happen depending on what you expose your jewelry to. You can clean tarnish off your jewelry with a soft dry cloth. Minimizing exposure to lotions, perfumes, sweat, and water, as well as cleaning your jewelry after every wear, will help protect the metal finish. Don't sleep or exercise in your new electroplated jewelry.

templates.name: Are these books appropriate for adopted children?
templates.content: Yes, our books work wonderfully for adopted children. Maia and Allan Haag, creators of I See Me! Personalized Books are adoptive parents themselves, and they met with other adoptive parents to ensure that each would work for adopted children. The books talk about the day when the child "arrived", rather than was born. This enables you to decide whether you want to include the child's actual date of birth, or the date when the child arrived in the family. Many families provide the date when the child arrived into the family. Our "My Very Own" books can be used as an educational tool to explain to the child how he or she was named by the family.

templates.name: Are your meals microwave and oven safe?
templates.content:
Our Kids Meals are microwavable directly in the trays in which they're served. Paper tray sleeves should be removed. Pierce the film seal and heat on high for 1 minute until internal temperature reaches 165° F. Heating times may vary - always refer to the packaging on your meal for specific instructions.

Our trays are not oven safe. Preheat oven to 350° F. Transfer the meal to an oven-safe container and cover with foil or other oven-safe cover. Heat for 10-15 minutes until internal temperature reaches 165° F. Heating times may vary and allow time to cool before serving. Always refer to the packaging on your meal for specific instructions.

templates.name: What's the difference between the Sodium version and the Cal/Mag version?
templates.content: Calcium Magnesium Butyrate includes two important minerals: magnesium is a cofactor in more than 600 enzymatic reactions that regulate biochemical reactions in the body. Calcium is the most abundant mineral in the body and is involved in making strong bones, nerve to nerve communication, muscle contraction, and activating blood clotting factors. Sodium Butyrate is the form that occurs naturally in the body and is the most widely researched. It is also in line with current research suggesting healthy sodium levels are indicated in longer lifespan. This form is recommended for most people.

templates.name: Can the laser be upgraded to higher power?

In some cases, mirror mounting brackets and laser mounting brackets need to be changed as well to accommodate the tube diameter changes.

templates.name: How do I redeem my points and apply them to my subscription?
templates.content:
To redeem your points and apply them to your subscription, please follow the steps below:

1. Log into your account on the website
2. Look for the "Loyalty and Rewards" section, which might be under your account settings or a dedicated rewards tab
3. Choose the reward you want to redeem using your points
4. Once you've selected your reward, you'll receive a unique discount code. This code will be used to apply the discount to your order
5. Go to the subscription management page. This could be found in your account settings or a dedicated subscription section.
6. On the subscription management page, there will be an option to change your subscription details. Towards the bottom left-hand side of this section, you'll find a field where you can enter the discount code
7. Enter the discount code you received earlier in this field
8. After entering the code, make sure to save or update your subscription changes. This ensures that the discount will be applied to your next scheduled order

templates.name: How much G Fuel can you have in a day?
templates.content: For our powdered Energy Formula products, treat G FUEL as you would a large cup of coffee, since the amount of caffeine is very similar. We suggest starting out with one serving a day to see how it feels and then increasing from there based on how much energy you need. For our 300 mg canned products, we recommend you do not exceed one serving per day.

templates.name: Do I need to do something different to treat color-resistant gray hair?
templates.content:
There are a few tips for ensuring your resistant grays are effectively camouflaged:

- Adjust the processing time from 35 minutes to 45 minutes
- Apply color to the most resistant area first (typically around hairline and top of head), then follow with the other sections as directed
- Circle back and reapply more color to the resistant area after all other sections are complete for additional color saturation

templates.name: What was the first product ever sold by Oral-B?
templates.content: The first Oral-B product sold was a toothbrush. It all started with a dentist in 1950, who created the first Oral-B toothbrush and its soft, end-rounded nylon bristles. Dr. Robert Hutson, a California periodontist, designed and patented the first Oral-B toothbrush. He also created the Oral-B brand name. "The first product was known as the Oral-B 60," said Dr. Hutson, "because it had 60 tufts."

templates.name: How do the smoothing patches work?
templates.content: When silicone is placed on the skin, a micro-climate environment is created between the skin and the silicone. It is this very unique environment that helps the skin heal itself. Moisture is drawn up from the lower skin layers to the outside layers, causing the skin to plump, fill in and smooth itself. You can read more about the science behind our patches here: https://www.siobeauty.com/pages/doctor-endorsed

templates.name: Medical Weight Loss: Why does my injection site feel bumpy?
templates.content: A bump at the injection site means the medication was injected just under the skin instead into the fat tissue. You want to pinch on an area of fat, ensure the needle is inserted all the way, and keep the needle injected for a few seconds before pulling it out, so all the medication has been absorbed properly. To prevent bumps, scar tissue, or irritation, rotate injection sites.

templates.name: What size junction box do I need for my fixture?

Our fixtures are all supplied with a mounting bracket that can mount to most electrical or junction box sizes. Fixtures will either be supplied with a 4" universal circle bracket, or a 4" strap bracket depending on how the fixture is mounted. Any junction box that is 4" or less at it's mounting points will be compatible with the brackets we supply, and will be concealed behind the fixture canopy.

Please note that the U/2 sconce and U/1 light fixture require use of a 4" round junction box due to the canopy and mounting system used.

templates.name: What is Pom handle material?
templates.content: POM (Polyoxymethylene) also known as Acetal or Polyacetal, is an engineering thermoplastic used in precision parts requiring high stiffness, high strength, and excellent wear resistance. It also has almost no moisture retention, making it an ideal material for Knife and Tool handles.

templates.name: How fast do succulents grow or spread?

templates.name: How do I clean my makeup brushes?
templates.content:
Proper care will prolong the life of your brushes. I recommend adding a small amount of mild shampoo and water to brush bristles to begin cleaning the brush(es), minimizing the amount of water that reaches the ferrule and 
handle, then rinse with warm water to remove makeup residue and soap. Once you remove excess water, reshape the brush bristles, and lay flat to dry.

templates.name: How do I keep the Ode Brew Grinder Gen 2 clean?
templates.content:
Please see the General Cleaning instructions in the Safety Manual. If you start to notice that there is more grind retention (grinds stuck in the exit chute) than when you first used the unit, don't worry! This is normal. We found during our testing that the grinder will run for about 60 cycles before it needs to be cleaned to operate at its best performance.

To clean it, remove the catch cup, and use the provided brush and "swipe" around the inside of the exit chute (where the coffee grounds come out). This will clean the chute and help the anti-static mechanisms working well.

templates.name: How is Camp365 powered?
templates.content: Camp365 comes with two separate electrical systems: a 12-volt DC deep cycle marine battery and a 120-volt AC system. The 12-volt battery is installed under the floor and is charged by the tow vehicle during transit or via solar power. It comes with a standard SAE solar port where you can plug in solar panels. The 120-volt system can be connected to any standard 120 volt outlet via an extension cord and a 15AMP Male to 30AMP female plug adapter (extension cord and adapter sold separately). That's the standard outlet you typically find in your living room or garage, or what RV Parks and campsites will often refer to as "Shore Power". You can also plug this 120-volt set up into a portable generator. The 12-volt DC battery will also recharge when the 120-volt AC system is being powered.

templates.name: Is 4ocean a company or nonprofit?

By creating jobs, utilizing the latest technology, and raising awareness about the impact of trash in the ocean, we are building the first economy for ocean plastic while creating a cleaner, more sustainable future for the ocean.

templates.name: Has the point-system changed?
templates.content: When we launched our rebrand, we also launched a new loyalty program that gives us the ability to offer some great new perks, like exclusive discounts on new product launches, higher reward vouchers (up to $1000, to save you time entering codes), a more seamless reward application process at checkout, and for our highest tier, the ability to gift free product with new launches. Lots of good stuff! When we launched the updated loyalty program, our new provider made the mistake of importing the program at $1 = 1 point, and made vouchers equivalent to this, as that is the default in their system. Unfortunately, it took us about 2 weeks to fix this after the program launched and it was brought to our attention. To be super clear, our point valuation didn't change, and your points are still worth the same amount as they were before the rebrand. There was a period where they were worth more than they should have been; customers never have had their point values decreased from how they have historically been. Our intention was absolutely not to mislead our customers in anyway, especially those who are most loyal to our business. We hope this helps provide clarity, and we really appreciate your partnership!

templates.name: Can your oils be ingested?
templates.content: While our oils are not labeled for internal use they are of the quality to be taken internally. Unfortunately, we are unable to provide dosing suggestions or directions on how to ingest, and would recommend consulting an Aromatherapist or trusted health professional for proper guidance.

templates.name: Store location / retailer
templates.content: We sell our products online and have Advocates across the US that would be more than happy to assist you with your order. If you would like to be paired with an Advocate in your area just let us know!

templates.name: Cancel / edit order
templates.content:
We immediately send each order to our distribution center to begin processing and preparing it for shipment. We move as fast as possible, so we cannot change or cancel anything on your order. 
We do offer free 30-day returns and exchanges to accommodate any changes you wish to make. Discounted items are excluded and cannot be returned or exchanged.

templates.name: Return policy
templates.content: You can check out our detailed return policy here: https://www.newtonbaby.com/pages/returns-exchanges

templates.name: Can I track my parcel?
templates.content: As soon as your order has been dispatched from our warehouse you will receive an email with your tracking number which will be live after 24 hours.

templates.name: How do I use my Lord & Taylor Gift Card?
templates.content: To redeem a Lord & Taylor gift card, please enter the gift card code into the "gift card or discount code" field at checkout.

templates.name: What are Boho Locs?
templates.content: Boho Locs are handmade crochet faux locs, with each loc having its own unique waves, twists and curls. The locs are very natural looking with a low sheen and lustre for a beautiful and believable result! They are made from the highest quality Japanese synthetic Kanekelon hair.

templates.name: Store location / retailer
templates.content: You can find us at a store near you here: https://www.brighton.com/pages/store-locator
